124102.「よく 来てくれたね。ここは 札強化屋だ。\n 今日は どんなご用かな？\n<s:
Good to see you. This is the Card Enhancement
Shop. What can I do for you today?
<select_se_off>
Add Effects to Ace of Wonders
Boost Ace of Wonders Effects
Remove Ace of Wonders Effects
Receive Ace of Wonders
Give Card
Explanation
<select_end><break>

124230.「効果を付けたい\n 不思議のカードは どれだい？\n<break>:
Which effect do you want to add to your Ace
of Wonders?
<break>

124231.「この中から 付けたい効果を\n 選んでくれるかな。\n<break>: Which effect do you want to add?<break>

124232.「<%sL_ADD_KOUKA>だね。\n 必要な素材を 消費して\n 効果を:
<%sL_ADD_KOUKA>? I'll take your
materials and add the effect. That good with
you?<yesno_2><break>

124234.「この不思議のカードは ロックされているね。\n 本当に 効果を付けても いいか:
That Ace of Wonders is locked. Are you sure
it's okay to add effects to it?
<yesno_2><break>

124235.「他に 用はあるかい？\n<select_se_off>\n不思議のカードの効果:
Is there anything else you need?
<select_se_off>
Add Effects to Ace of Wonders
Boost Ace of Wonders Effects
Remove Ace of Wonders Effects
Receive Ace of Wonders
Give Card
Explanation
<select_end><break>

124236.「効果を消したい\n 不思議のカードは どれだい？\n<break>:
Which Ace of Wonders do you want to remove an
effect from?
<break>

124237.「消したい効果を 選んでくれるかな。\n<break>:
Choose the effect you want to remove.
<break>

124238.「<%sL_ERASE_KOUKA>だね。\n 効果を消した後 使った素材は\n:
<%sL_ERASE_KOUKA>? After removing the effect, I'll give you back the materials you used. It costs <%dL_CARD_GOLD> gold, but is it ok if I
remove the effect of <%sL_ERASE_KOUKA>?

124240.「この不思議のカードには これ以上\n 効果を付けられないな……。\n すまない:
I can't add any more effects to this Ace of
Wonders I'm sorry but you'll have to pick
another card.
<bw_break>

124241.「効果を消すには\n <%nL_CARD_GOLD>ゴールド 必要なんだが\n:
I need <%dL_CARD_GOLD> gold to remove the
effect, but apparently you don't have enough.
<bw_break>

124242.「選んだカードは ロックされているね。\n 別のカードを 選んでくれるかな。\n:
The card you chose is locked. Can you choose
another card?
<bw_break>

124243.「……すまないが ひとつの不思議のカードに\n 同じ効果は付けられないんだ。\n:
I'm sorry, but I can't put the same effect on
one Ace of Wonders. You can choose a different
effect.
<bw_break>

124244.「必要な素材が 足りないようだね。\n<bw_break>: I don't think we have what we need.<bw_break>

124245.「そのカードには なにも効果が付いてないな。\n すまないが 別の不思議のカード:
I'm sorry, but that card has no effect. I'm
sorry, but you'll have to choose another Ace
of Wonders.
<bw_break>

124246.「効果を成長させたい\n 不思議のカードは どれだい？\n<break>:
Which Ace of Wonders do you want to grow the
effect?
<break>

124247.「成長させたい効果を 選んでくれるかな。\n<break>:
Choose the effect you want to enhance.
<break>

124248.「<%sL_GROW_KOUKA2>にするなら\n 必要な素材を 消費して\n:
If you'd like <%sL_GROW_KOUKA2>,
I'll need the necessary materials to
enhance it. Is that all right?
<yesno><break>

124249.<pipipi_off>\n<%sL_WATASITA_ITEM><%sM_pl:
<pipipi_off>
The <%sL_GROW_KOUKA> attached to the
<%sL_WATASITA_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> has grown into
<%sL_GROW_KOUKA2>!
<se_nots System 7>
<end>

124250.「この不思議のカードは ロックされているね。\n 本当に 効果を成長させても い:
This Ace of Wonders is a lock. Are you sure
you don't mind if I grow the effect?
<yesno_2><break>

124254.「僕の店では 不思議のカードという 札アクセに\n キミの望む通りの 合成効果を:
In my store, you can add any effect you want to the Ace of Wonders, which is a free gift, but I will charge you for the materials needed
to add or enhance the effect. You can also remove the effect once you have added it. You will also get back all the materials you used
for the effect. However, you will need <%dL_CARD_GOLD> gold to remove the effect, so please understand that. Also, Ace of Wonders
cannot be discarded. If you want to discard unwanted cards, I will take them back as long as all effects are removed.

124255.「僕でよかったら いつでもチカラになろう。\n 用がある時は 遠慮なく 声をかけ:
If it's okay with you, I'm always here for
you. If you need anything, please don't
hesitate to call me.<end>

125142.「不思議のカードを 持ってないようだね。\n<end>:
I see you don't have Ace of Wonders.
<end>

125536.「よく 来てくれたね。ここは 札強化屋だ。\n しかし 塔がこの状態では\n 商:
Thank you for coming. This is the Card Enhancement Shop. But with the tower in the state it's in, business is slow, and I'd
appreciate it if some other like-minded person would come along and help Mr. Chacolot out.

125537.「<%sL_GET_ITEM>を もらっていくかい？\n<yesno><brea:
Would you like to get the
<%sL_GET_ITEM>?
<yesno><break>

125540.「<%sL_BAG_TYPE>が いっぱいで\n <%sL_GET_ITEM>は:
Looks like <%sL_BAG_TYPE> is full and can't
hold <%sL_GET_ITEM>.
<bw_break>

125573.「<%sL_BAG_TYPE>が いっぱいで\n <%sL_MODORU_ITE:
Looks like <%sL_BAG_TYPE> is full and can't
hold <%sL_MODORU_ITEM>.
<bw_break>

125643.「やめておくんだね。\n ほしくなったら いつでも言ってくれ。\n<bw_bre:
Stop? If you ever want it, just let me know.
<bw_break>

125644.「このカードは 捨てられないけど\n 『カードを返す』を 選んでくれたら\n い:
You can't throw this card away, but if you
choose "return card," I'll take back the card
you no longer want.
<bw_break>

126078.「……すまないが その効果は\n これ以上 成長させられないんだ。\n 別の効果:
...I'm sorry, but that effect can't grow any
more. Could you choose another effect for me?
<bw_break>

126089.「キミが 魔物退治に協力してくれたおかげで\n ようやく 商売を再開できそうだよ:
Thanks to your help in exterminating the monster, we are finally going to be able to reopen our business. Let me say thank you.
Thank you. I'm Card Enhancer Rabero, and in my store I can add any effect you want to your Ace of Wonders, which I give away for free,
but to add or enhance it, I need to charge you for the materials needed. You can delete the effect once you have added it. Ace of Wonders
cannot be thrown away. If you have any unwanted cards, I will take them back after all effects are removed.

286362.「不要になったカードを 引き取ろう。\n どれを 渡すんだい？ \n<break:
I'll take back the cards you no longer need.
Which one do you want to give me?
<break>

286363.「どの不要なカードを 渡すんだい？\n<break>:
Which card are you going to give me that I
don't need?
<break>

286364.「このカードには\n まだ効果がついてるから 引き取れないよ。\n<bw_bre:
I can't take it back because the card still
has the effect on it.
<bw_break>

286365.「選択した不思議のカードを 引き取るよ。\n 本当に 良いかな？\n<yesno:
I'll take back the Ace of Wonders of your
choice. Are you sure you want to do this?
<yesno 2><break>

286366.「はい では 引き取るよ。\n<bw_break>:
Yes, then I'll take it back.
<bw_break>

287406.「装備中のものは 引き取れないよ。\n<bw_break>:
I can't take back what you have equipped.
<bw_break>

292896.「<%sL_REPLICA_NAME>を もらっていくかい？\n<yesno><:
Would you like to take <%sL_REPLICA_NAME> with
you?
<yesno><break>

292897.「不思議のカードと 同じ効果をコピーした\n 『<%sL_REPLICA_NAM:
It is now possible to create a <%sL_REPLICA_NAME> that copies the same effect as the Ace of Wonders. Once copied, the effect
cannot be changed, but if you change the effect of Ace of Wonders, the effect of <%sL_REPLICA_NAME> will not be changed. To
create <%sL_REPLICA_NAME>, you need <%sL_DAIJINAMONO>. For more information, please ask Archivist Marta.

292911.「どのカードを もらっていくかい？\n<select_se_off>\n不思議の:
Which card would you like to take?
<select_se_off>
Ace of Wonders
<%sL_REPLICA_NAME>
<select_end><break>

293732.「どの説明を きくんだい？\n<select_se_off>\n不思議のカードに:
Which explanation do you want?
<select_se_off>
About Ace of Wonders
About <%sL_REPLICA_NAME>
<select_end><break>

293733.「『<%sL_DAIJINAMONO>』を もっていれば\n 『<%sL_REP:
If you have <%sL_DAIJINAMONO>, you can create <%sL_REPLICA_NAME>. When you create it, you have to exchange it for the necessary
materials. When you create <%sL_REPLICA_NAME>, the same effect as your Ace of Wonders will be copied to <%sL_REPLICA_NAME>. You can use it
conveniently by copying it. <%sL_REPLICA_NAME> cannot be thrown away, so if you have any cards you don't need, I will take them back by
"Returning a card".

293817.「<%sL_REPLICA_NAME>だね。キミが持っている\n 不思議のカード:
<%sL_REPLICA_NAME>, which will make a copy of a card that has the same effect as your Ace of Wonders. Note that when you return the
<%sL_REPLICA_NAME> that you no longer need, you will not get back the materials you used.

293818.「<%sL_REPLICA_NAME>を つくるためには\n <%sL_NEED:
I need <%sL_NEED_ITEM> and <%dL_NEED_TIP> to
make <%sL_REPLICA_NAME>, but it seems I don't
have enough.
<bw_break>

293819.「<%sL_REPLICA_NAME>の 元となる\n 不思議のカードを 選んで:
Choose the Ace of Wonders from which
<%sL_REPLICA_NAME> is to be derived.
<break>

293820.「<%sL_NEED_ITEM>が <%dL_NEED_TIP>こ 必要だが\n:
I need <%dL_NEED_TIP> <%sL_NEED_ITEM>s to create one,
but I see that you have <%dL_TIP> of them now.
Are you sure you want me to make one?
<yesno 2><break>

293821.「このカードには 効果が\n ひとつも ついていないから\n <%sL_REPL:
You cannot make <%sL_REPLICA_NAME> on this
card because it does not have any effect.
<bw_break>

293822.「選択した<%sL_REPLICA_NAME>を 引き取ろう。\n 引き取ったカ:
Let's take back the selected
<%sL_REPLICA_NAME>. I can't return the card,
but can I really take it back?
<yesno 2><break>
